Posts.Content: Hello! Im at my wits end. Im a 43 year old lady who was nearly 5 years clear of breast cancer and it Has returned. I have been told it is in my lymph in my neck and also about an inch above my chest. Waiting for a body scan now and to see the oncologyst. I am totally heartbroken but i am a fighter by nature and i just Want to know there will be some treatment to help/ maintain, if not cure. Can anyone help ? X
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Reoccurance

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your comment. Is there no chemo available for this? X
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Reoccurance

Posts.Content: Hi there. After being told two weeks ago my repast cancer has returned after nearly five years, I finally get to see my oncology team tomorrow. The wait has been torture. In the last two weeks I have had a biopsy of the neck and upper chest and a body scan. Although deep down I know what it is, I just need to know there is hope and sme treatment can be offered. I'm a normally mentally strong person who will put up a big fight again, I just want the chance to do so, please send me positive vibes x x x
Posts.Title: Wish me luck please
